Description: Deadlock - Six New Heroes - Steam News
... coming to the streets of the {{PageRef|Curse}}d Apple
store.steampowered.com
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: Health regen increased from 2.5 to 3.0
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: Health per boon reduced from 44 to 43
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} bullet amp increased from 8% to 9%
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} increased base health boost from 75 to 80 and reduced T3 health boost from +65 to +50
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} reduced health boost spirit scaling from 0.9x to 0.8x
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} base duration reduced from 8.5s to 8.0s and duration on {{PageRef|Heavy Melee|alt_name=heavy melee}} reduced from 5.0s to 4.5s
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} cooldown reduced from 30s to 27s
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} no longer gives bonus health from objectives
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Chain Gang}} time to break LOS increased by 0.1s
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Bashdown}} {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} scaling increased from 1x to 1.1x
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Bashdown}} spirit damage reduced from 40 to 35 and scaling reduced from 1.2x to 1.1x
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Bashdown}} impact center is now slightly closer to {{PageRef|Billy}}
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Chain Gang}} will snap slightly faster when target is out of LOS
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Chain Gang}} pull consistency improved in complex terrain
* Doorman: {{PageRef|Call Bell}} cooldown increased from 16s to 18s
* Doorman: {{PageRef|Luggage Cart}} T3 stun reduced duration from 1.5s to 1.2s
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Weapon damage per boon reduced from 0.693 to 0.55
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Weapon base fire rate slowed by 5% (partial base damage compensation, but primarily an overall nerf)
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Health per boon reduced from 43 to 41
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: {{PageRef|Rend}} T3 {{PageRef|Bullet Lifesteal}} reduced from 55% to 45%
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: {{PageRef|Bloodscent}} T3 Amplified damage reduced from +13% to +11%
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Sanguine Retreat}} T3 increased from -7s cooldown to -12s Cooldown
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Love Bites}} cooldown reduced from 8s to 7s
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Love Bites}} T3 changed from -3s cooldown to 1 Stamina Drain and 30% Slow for 3s
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Nox Nostra}} cooldown reduced from 150s to 130s
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Nox Nostra}} silence duration increased from 1s to 1.25s
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: Fixed some pathfinding issues with {{PageRef|Conjure Dragon}}
